question: Find the correct alternative that when filled in the blanks in the same sequence will make the series logically complete: _ _ VZ _ V _ V _ ZV _ _ V _
explanation: Option C produces repeated ZVV pattern throughout the sequence.

question: F is immediately to the right of E. E is in the fourth position to the right of G. C is sitting next to both B and D. The person to the third position on the left of D is at one of the ends. What is the current location of A?
choices: A) Between the letters E and D
explanation: E is 4th to G's right (G _ _ _ E F). C sits between B and D. Filling the gap gives the sequence G-B-C-D-E-F. Since D is 4th, the person 3rd to its left is G (an end). A takes the remaining spot at the extreme right.

question:
Statement I: Some money is cash.
Statement II: Some cash are draft
Statement III: All drafts are bills
Conclusion I: Some money are draft
Conclusion II: Some money is bills
choices: A) If only conclusion I follow
B) If only conclusion II follows
C) If conclusion I and II both follow
D) If neither conclusion I nor conclusion II follows
explanation: Money-draft overlap is not definite; hence bills also not definite.
